attributes.action: Divert all money from the foreign aid budget into the NHS until 2020
attributes.additional_details: The UK is one of the only countries that means the 0.7% of GBP to fund overseas aid. But now the UK has to put UK citizens first.
attributes.background: The NHS is in crisis and needs the full support of the government. Austerity means that finances are tight, during the next 3 years all funds allocated to overseas aid should be diverted into Health and Social Care.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177384
